**Edited <time datetime="2015-12-03T03:13:55Z" title="12/03/2015 03:13  AM" data-short="8 yr">December 3, 2015</time> by blackrack**

a.) What graphics settings do you guys use? Even with max textures and 8x AA I still get jaggies.

b.) Why the hell is EVE and Scatterer not standard KSP functionality. Once you've played these, you never want to go back to those 1990s graphics.

I'm out on my phone or I would make a quick and likely very bad one, how close does the resemblance to an f-14 need to be, I only use stock parts and I am not sure I could do swing wings in less than a week.

Well, this bit of code is called to create several meshes [https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/blob/ocean/scatterer/Ocean/OceanNode.cs#L239-L287](https://github.com/LGhassen/Scatterer/blob/ocean/scatterer/Ocean/OceanNode.cs#L239-L287)

I think the meshes may be all at screen depth while the shader does some trickery later on.
